title: Berd-Bot
longDescription: A discord.js bot used for music playing, image editing and AI voice model training

title: i-PIMS
longDescription: An asset management software made for PETRONAS which includes asset listing, maintenance and repair.

title: LoopFoods
longDescription: Grab-like application that allows users to order food for delivery, pickup and dine-in. Features support for catering as well as group ordering.

title: Travel Curator
longDescription: A website that lets people plan trips to Singapore and Japan. Features inclusive of itinerary generation, location suggestions and accomodations for specific needs.

title: Trace Sg
longDescription: A property website that advertises their property development services alongside some examples of existing projects.

title: Revue
longDescription: A social media platform similar to Instagram that allows users to add ratings, hashtags and images to their posts.

title: MiniShop
longDescription: A website for business owners to list and manage their product catalogue. Users are also able to purchase products listed.
